content: ***this item is a digital pdf crochet pattern you will not receive the finished toy like in the photos *** this is a crochet pattern written in english only and uses standard us terms you will receive a 4-page pdf refunds are not available on this item difficulty beginner skills required crocheting in a spiral magic_ring single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet bobble stitch slip_stitch increasing decreasing and chaining supplies required + medium weight chenille or velvet yarn i used bernat baby velvet in sky blue for the head color and snowy white for the belly color + 10mm safety eyes + 3 25mm crochet hook + scissors + darning needle + stitch marker * polyester fiberfill for stuffing this pattern is workable in any yarn type so long as you change your hook size and safety eye size to make waffle more chunky use 12mm eyes chunky chenille yarn and a 4 5mm crochet hook i used premier parfait chunky in peach and white this pattern will be available for immediate download copyright © 2024 johannamigurumi contents of this document may not be copied altered reproduced published or distributed in any way all photographs included in this listing and pdf are property of johannamigurumi and may not be used without written consent you may sell finished products made with this pattern provided credit to johannamigurumi happy crocheting i would love to see your finished item please tag @johannamigurumi on instagram
